attributes.action: Re-instate the death penalty for serious criminal offences such as murder of a minor and murder of a police officer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prison sentences no longer act as a deterrent and many of those released from our jails go on to commit more serious offences.  Prison as a means of rehabilitation is questionable and expensive with each prisoner costing approximately £50000pa to incarcerate.  The death penalty, whilst harsh, is merited in some cases for example the Soham murderer Ian Huntley.  I believe strongly that these cowardly criminals would seriously think twice before committing these heinous crimes if the result would mean losing their own sorry lives.  Today’s’ society shows a marked lack of respect for authority, human life and other peoples property.  It is time to re-introduce the death penalty and give our law enforcement agencies and criminal justice system some real teeth in order to restore respect in our country.
